desc: Prepare your students to transition their Microsoft Office 2007 skills to the Office 2010 software with UPGRADING TO MICROSOFT OFFICE 2010. This is the perfect guide to help your students easily understand the new features and skills within the Office 2010 software. Skills are presented in a highly visual two-page spread approach. Using both products together will allow you to expose your students to Office 2010, enable them to stay current and gauge their competency in Microsoft Office 2007 and 2010 with one assessment product.

details.authors: Mary-Terese Cozzola, Barbara Clemens, Barbara M. Waxer

title: Upgrading to Microsoft Office 2010 (Available Titles Skills Assessment Manager (SAM) â€“ Office 2010)
